message.name: ERR_APPEAL_SEARCH_FV_APPELLANT_PARTICIPANT_AND_APPELLANT_AS_ORGANIZATION
message.locale: Cannot specify an appellant name when the organization is the appellant.
Cannot specify an appellant name when the organisation is the appellant.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_SEARCH_FV_RESPONDENT_PARTICIPANT_AND_RESPONDENT_AS_ORGANIZATION
message.locale: Cannot specify a respondent name when the organization is the respondent.
Cannot specify a respondent name when the organisation is the respondent.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_SEARCH_FV_INVALID_HEARING_DATE
message.locale: The creation date must be before the hearing date.

message.name: ERR_APPEALSEARCH_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: No Appeal Search implemented. Please contact an Administrator.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_SEARCH_FV_APPELLANT_AND_RESPONDENT
message.locale: Cannot specify both an appellant name and a respondent name.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_SEARCH_FV_APPELLANT_AND_RESPONDENT_TYPE_AS_ORGANIZATION
message.locale: Cannot specify the organization as both the appellant type and the respondent type.
Cannot specify the organisation as both the appellant type and the respondent type.

message.name: ERR_FV_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MISSING
message.locale: At least one search criteria must be entered.
